member.name: M:DocaLabs.Http.Client.Extension.NewtonSoft.JsonDeserializer.Deserialize(System.String,System.Type)
member.summary: Deserializes an object from string in JSON notation.

member.name: M:DocaLabs.Http.Client.Extension.NewtonSoft.JsonDeserializer.UpdateSettings(System.Type,Newtonsoft.Json.JsonSerializerSettings)
member.summary: Updates/adds settings information which will be used when the specified type is being serialized. Use that to customize behaviour of the JsonConvert.

member.name: M:DocaLabs.Http.Client.Extension.NewtonSoft.JsonSerializer.Serialize(System.Object)
member.summary: Serializes an object into string using JSON notation.

member.name: M:DocaLabs.Http.Client.Extension.NewtonSoft.JsonSerializer.UpdateSettings(System.Type,DocaLabs.Http.Client.Extension.NewtonSoft.SerializationSettings)
member.summary: Updates/adds settings information which will be used when the specified type is being serialized. Use that to customize behaviour of the JsonConvert.

member.name: T:DocaLabs.Http.Client.Extension.NewtonSoft.SerializationSettings
member.summary: Defines serialization settings that can be used to customize the behaviour of the NewtonSoftDefaultJsonSerializer class.

member.name: M:DocaLabs.Http.Client.Extension.NewtonSoft.SerializationSettings.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes an instance of the SerializationSettings class with default values.

member.name: M:DocaLabs.Http.Client.Extension.NewtonSoft.SerializationSettings.#ctor(System.Type,Newtonsoft.Json.Formatting,Newtonsoft.Json.JsonSerializerSettings)
member.summary: Initializes an instance of the SerializationSettings class with the specified values.

member.name: P:DocaLabs.Http.Client.Extension.NewtonSoft.SerializationSettings.Type
member.summary: The type of the value being serialized. This parameter is used when Newtonsoft.Json.TypeNameHandling" is Auto to write out the type name if the type of the value does not match. Specifying the type is optional. The default value is null.

member.name: P:DocaLabs.Http.Client.Extension.NewtonSoft.SerializationSettings.Formatting
member.summary: Indicates how the output is formatted. The default value is None.

member.name: P:DocaLabs.Http.Client.Extension.NewtonSoft.SerializationSettings.Settings
member.summary: The settings used to serialize the object. If this is null, default serialization settings will be is used. The default value is null.
